Q0: Whole Exome Sequencing (WES); gene content not specified.
Q17: To submit a claim, ensure that the test is ordered by an approved specialist (medical geneticist, neonatologist, neurologist, or developmental pediatrician), provide documentation of clinical necessity as defined by the policy, and include the appropriate CPT code. Claims must be submitted in accordance with the member-specific benefit plan and any applicable state or federal mandates. Medical records may be required to demonstrate that all policy criteria are met.
